name: Watch Out Below
description:
Simple platform game where you need to get as deep as possible without dying. Collect coins and buy items from the shops on every 25th floor to help you get further.

This was created for my first game jam and I’m quite happy with how it turned out, even if I wasted the first day on a different idea!

Controls:

Movement with WASD / Arrow Keys

Space / Shift / Enter to cast spell

S / Down Arrow + Space to cast a spell downwards
